name: Turmeric Glow Brightening Refillable Moisturizer
about: What it is:An ultra-hydrating, refillable moisturizer that reduces the appearance of hyperpigmentation and dullness for visibly brighter, plumper, glowing skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness.Formulation:Rich Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Liposome Blend of Turmeric, Licorice, and Noni Fruit: Nourishes and conditions skin..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This nourishing cream smooths and visibly plumps your skin, leaving it looking firm and glowing. Powered by a blend of turmeric and noni fruit extract, it visibly brightens, soothes, and fortifies while minimizing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles..Clinical Results:In an independent clinical study of 51 consumers (ages 25 to 55), over a 4-week period of twice-daily use:
ingredients: -Liposome Blend of Turmeric, Licorice, and Noni Fruit: Nourishes and conditions skin..-Marine Microalgae: Is a powerful source of essential fatty acids and carotenoids..-Desert Date Oil: Boosts moisture to smooth and visibly plump skin...Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Glycerin^, Coconut Alkanes, Cetearyl Alcohol, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil*, Balanites Roxburghii Seed Oil*, Water/Aqua/Eau, Lactobacillus Ferment, Cetearyl Olivate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Sorbitan Olivate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Seabuckthorn) Fruit Oil*, Passiflora Edulis (Maracuja) Seed Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract*, Lactobacillus, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint Indian) Leaf Oil*, Sclerotium Gum, Potassium Hydroxide, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract*, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract*, Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Extract*, Yeast (Faex) Powder, Sodium Phytate, Cylindrotheca Fusiformis Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Juniperus Virginiana (Cedarwood) Oil, Leuconostoc Ferment Filtrate, Tocopherol , Bisabolol, Soybean Peroxidase, Superoxide Dismutase, Alcohol, Citral**, Geraniol**, Limonene**, Linalool**...*Ingredients from Organic Farming..**From essential oils..^Made using organic ingredients..99.8% natural origin of total. 70.0% of the total ingredients are from organic farming. 70.0% organic of total minus water and minerals. Customers should refer to product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.***..The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Warm a pearl-size portion in your palms and gently massage onto a clean face, neck, and decolletage in the morning and evening, after your serum. .-Fantastic for prepping skin for makeup..-Use with refill pod included. (Additional pods sold separately.)..Recycling Instructions:.-Remove empty pod and rinse out any excess product..-Recycle pod and place new refill pod into glass jar..-If you choose not to reuse the jar or refill it with a new pod, discard cap and recycle glass jar.
